title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item in library outline view at first attempt
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item on the first attempt. The focus instead jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Select the label item in the library outline view.

Observed Behavior (OB): Any item cannot be selected at the first time in the library outline view. The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Expected Behavior (EB): When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the item should be highlighted and selected.

Steps to Reproduce (SR):
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Select the label item in the library outline view.
